Name: Zombie World Pixel
About the game: Zombie World Pixel is a top-down survival shooter. The goal of the game is to survive in a small town and find all the necessary parts in order to fix the car. Not only zombies will interfere with you, but hunger, thirst and fatigue, so loot everything you see, but remember that the carry weight is limited, so sell everything you find to the merchants that are in the city. You can buy weapons and ammo or first-aid kits and various power-ups from merchants. On the way you will meet closed doors, they can be broken open with a master key. the longer you stay in the city, the more zombies will appear and they will become stronger, new types will appear, faster, more tenacious. The choice is given to one of three characters that differ in their characteristics, such as survivability, speed and carry weight.
